original: Lundhquist, Nils David, postmästare, Värnamo, f. 26/5/85 i Hov, Öster-götl. 1., av godsäg. Erik L. o. Emy Danielson-Aschan. G. 10 m. Ingrid Nordfeldt. Barn: Sven-Erik f 13, Sara 16, Ulla 20. — Lärov :stud. i Lin-köp. E. o. postexp. i östra distr. 03, e. bitr. där 05, i Motala 06, tf. postexp. där 08, postexp. 09, i Mariestad 15, postassist. där 25, förste postassi-st. 27, postmäst. i Töreboda 36, i Åse-le s. å. samt i Värnamo sed. 39. V. ordf. i Skara sekt. av Posttj :män-nens fören. 22, ordf. 24-28. I Mariestad bl. a. rev. f. stadens räkensk. 18-35, ordf. i djurskrfören. 21-35, sekr. i styr. f. renhålln :verket 25-31, i häl-sov:nd 27-28, led. av taxrnd 25-35, siffergransk. i A-B Tidn. f. Skarab. län 26-35. RVO.
translated: Lundhquist, Nils David, postmaster, Värnamo, born on May 26, 1885 in Hov, Östergötland County, son of estate owner Erik L. and Emy Danielson-Aschan. Married on October 10, 19xx to Ingrid Nordfeldt. Children: Sven-Erik, born in 19xx, Sara, born in 19xx, Ulla, born in 19xx. Education: Studied in Linköping. Initially employed as a temporary postal worker in the eastern district in 1903, became an assistant in 1905, worked in Motala in 1906, acted as interim postal worker there in 1908, became a postal worker in 1909, worked in Mariestad in 1915, became a post assistant in 1925, first post assistant in 1927, appointed as postmaster in Töreboda in 1936, in Åsele in the same year, and in Värnamo since 1939. Vice Chairman of the Skara section of the Postal Employees Association from 1922 and Chairman from 1924 to 1928. In Mariestad, among other roles, served as auditor for the city's accounts from 1918 to 1935, Chairman of the animal husbandry association from 1921 to 1935, Secretary of the sanitation board from 1925 to 1931, Secretary of the health commission from 1927 to 1928, member of the tax committee from 1925 to 1935, and digit checker at A-B Tidningen for Skaraborg County from 1926 to 1935. Awarded the Royal Swedish Order of Vasa (RVO).
